title: Looking for a Gold 3+ Duo
body:
I can play ADC/MID/SUP, Most games I've been having bad players, and I've had a decent score on my end. They would throw and cause the game to end up in a defeat. SoloQ is going very bad for me. I had a constant win rate then it just dropped.

My Jungle and Top need work, but can be great with proper communication.

If you are interested, msg me here or add me in-game. (Aro)

replies.body:
I main support. Last season i was bronze 2, but thats because I didn't play properly/competitively. I am currently in placements and have won 7/7 so far. If you want me to sup you then add me: Finnster. I have nothing to hide, so check my match history if you wish. I also play with a few other mates that can will the other roles and they are silver aswell. 
Thanks
-Finn
